EmailTemplate.name: 05-24-21 BNK PFDFW Phase 2 Email 2.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Join NCR at the Google Cloud Financial Services Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Exceeding consumer expectations for frictionless, digitally-enabled transactions is the key to a successful digital transformation. Join NCR at the Google Cloud Financial Services Summit to see how you can accelerate your own drive to digital at your financial institution. With your complementary registration, you will hear some of the brightest and bravest minds in the financial world discuss new possibilities to further your business. Listen to the on-demand presentation from NCR’s CTO Tim Vanderham, Tarrah Palomino and Ravi Nemalikanti as they share key insights and real-world stories of how FIs are using the latest technologies to build digital first customer journeys. ${CTAText3} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> ${CTA2Text4} <[[${CTA2URL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
